nodes.text: The WGF Veteran was a model of speeder bike produced by Vectron during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The Vectron WGF Veteran was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on April 16, 2015. It was released on the in-game Cartel Market at the price of 1,800 Cartel Coins, and is the first mount to feature a "flourish"—pressing CTRL+Z triggers an animation where the engine covers open and release a burst of smoke and engine fire.
